intro.title: Evgenii Bulgakov
intro.subtitle: Senior Frontend Engineer & System Architect
intro.description: 10+ years of experience building scalable, high-load e-commerce platforms with 100k+ daily users. I turn complex business requirements into high-performance web solutions.

adaptation.title: Bridging Design & Engineering
adaptation.description: I don't just implement layouts; I bridge the gap between product managers, designers, and developers. I transform static designs into pixel-perfect, maintainable UI components, ensuring the final product matches the vision even when specs are incomplete.

development.title: Performance & Architecture
development.description: My focus is on web performance and scalability. I have experience revamping frontend architectures to improve critical metrics by 2x in PageSpeed Insights. Whether it's a monolith or microservices, I choose the best tool for the product's needs.

ecommerce.title: Business-Critical Solutions
ecommerce.description: I build solutions that drive revenue. From creating a Print-on-Demand PoC in two weeks that became a primary revenue stream to maintaining large-scale B2B platforms. I understand the cost of a UI mistake and prioritize testing and stability.

approach.title: My Approach
approach.description: You can provide me with a task description written on a napkin, and I will personally organize the milestones, stories, and tasks. I am not a 'text-box programmer' â€” I solve business problems through technology.
